PARAM.name: INPUT:RA
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Specify the Right Ascension coordinate. To be specified in Equatorial Coordinates J2000.

PARAM.name: INPUT:DEC
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Specify the Declination coordinate. To be specified in Equatorial Coordinates J2000.

PARAM.name: INPUT:START_TIME
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Specify the Start Time to check for visibility. To be specified in UTC time.

PARAM.name: INPUT:END_TIME
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Specify the End Time to check for visibility. To be specified in UTC.
